title: Quadratic Equations
subject: Algebra
body: Quadratic Equations are second degree equations, meaning that the highest exponent contained within the equation is a squaure.
footer: Quadratic Equations help us to understand parabolic arcs, like the trajectory of a projectile - a basketball jumpshot, or the path a baseball takes upon being hit by a batter.

title: Systems of Equations
subject: Algebra
body: Systems of Equations are any sets of equations who are satisfied by the same (x, y) pair.
